00032    // before each pass. Return None if processing should stop.
00033    // These should not depend on mOutputWaveTracks having been set up via CopyInputWaveTracks().
00034    virtual bool InitPass1();
00035    virtual bool InitPass2();

00045    
00046    // Call this if you know in advance that no second pass will be needed.
00047    // This is used as a hint for the progress bar
00048    void DisableSecondPass() { mSecondPassDisabled = true; }
